description: This roast lamb is sure to level up your Sunday roast. Accompanied by roasted sweet onion and tomatoes, this lamb is sure to impress.
name: Roast Lamb With Mixed Tomato “Sauce” Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 red onions, cut into thick wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Place lamb in a large baking dish. Drizzle with half the oil and season. Bake for 30 minutes or until golden. Remove dish from oven. Reduce oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced.

Arrange tomatoes, onion, thyme and bay leaves around lamb. Drizzle with wine and remaining oil. Bake for a further 30 minutes for medium or until lamb is cooked to your liking. Season. Serve scattered with oregano.
